column4: If you have unrealircd, I doubt it's Gentoo's conspiracy, but possible the security flaw/bug in unrealircd.
it got published on the gentoo site, and zdnet picked it up (although they make it sound a whole lot worse than it really is...)
I see the article. I run root commands on your unrealircd? Can I? In any case, you should be using Funtoo instead of Gentoo IMO. :)
i don't run gentoo, i just thought the story was interesting
